Package com.amonson.node_monitoring

Class ClusterServiceMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amonson.node_monitoring.ClusterServiceMonitor
  • public class ClusterServiceMonitor
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to create a service node in a cluster. Each node has 1 of 2 roles, primary or secondary.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  ClusterServiceMonitor.Role
      Enum for the 2 possible roles.
      static interface  ClusterServiceMonitor.RoleChange
      Defined callback for the Role changes as the cluster changes.

      Constructors

      Construct the monitoring object that participates in a cluster.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClusterServiceMonitor

        public ClusterServiceMonitor​(java.lang.String myHostname,
                             java.lang.String[] clusterNodes,
                             ClusterServiceMonitor.RoleChange callback,
                             java.util.logging.Logger logger)
        Construct the monitoring object that participates in a cluster.
        Parameters:
        myHostname - This nodes hostname.
        clusterNodes - All the hostnames in the cluster of services.
        callback - Callback that receives either a primary or secondary state. Only one primary can exist in the cluster at a time.
        logger - Th native Java Logger to log messages.

      • ClusterServiceMonitor

        public ClusterServiceMonitor​(java.lang.String myHostname,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> clusterNodes,
                             ClusterServiceMonitor.RoleChange callback,
                             java.util.logging.Logger logger)
        Construct the monitoring object that participates in a cluster.
        Parameters:
        myHostname - This nodes hostname.
        clusterNodes - All the hostnames in the cluster of services.
        callback - Callback that receives either a primary or secondary state. Only one primary can exist in the cluster at a time.
        logger - Th native Java Logger to log messages.

    • Method Detail

      • setPort

        public void setPort​(int port)
        Set the port for communication. This will be bound to in the process. Must be called before starting the cluster.
        Parameters:
        port - Must be >1024 and <65536.

      • startMonitoring

        public void startMonitoring​(boolean blocking)
        Join the cluster.
        Parameters:
        blocking - If set to true this method will block, if false the process will run in the background.

      • stopMonitoring

        public void stopMonitoring()
        Leave the cluster.

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Test if the node in the cluster.
        Returns:
        true if the process is part of the cluster; false if it's not.

      • getRole

        public ClusterServiceMonitor.Role getRole()
        Get the current role manually.
        Returns:
        This processes current role.
